core.name: AI-Driven Micro-Interactions Generator
core.description: Automatically creates and optimizes micro-interactions based on user behavior and context

core.name: Automated Accessibility Auditor
core.description: Conducts real-time accessibility audits and provides actionable recommendations

supporting.name: Emotion-Based Design Advisor
supporting.description: Provides design suggestions based on emotional intelligence and user sentiment analysis

supporting.name: Collaborative Design Insights Platform
supporting.description: Facilitates real-time collaboration and insights sharing among designers and stakeholders

integration.name: AR/VR/MR & Physical UI Hybridizer
integration.description: Simplifies integration of UI components across augmented, virtual, mixed reality, and physical environments

integration.name: Voice-Controlled UI Designer
integration.description: Enables designers to create and modify UI components using voice commands

analytics.name: Real-Time Design Performance Dashboard
analytics.description: Provides real-time insights and analytics on design performance, user engagement, and interaction patterns

analytics.name: A/B Testing and Design Experimentation Platform
analytics.description: Facilitates A/B testing and design experimentation to inform data-driven design decisions
